mapper.select: SELECT u.usr_id, u.usr_pwd, u.usr_email, u.cre_usr_id, u.cre_dt, u.upd_usr_id, u.upd_dt, u.del_flg, r.sys_role_id, r.sys_role_cd, r.sys_role_desc FROM usr u LEFT JOIN usr_sys_role ur ON u.usr_id = ur.usr_id AND ur.del_flg = 'F' AND ur.usr_role_status_cd = 'ACTIVE' LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.sys_role_id = r.sys_role_id AND r.del_flg = 'F' WHERE u.usr_id = #{usrId} AND u.del_flg = 'F'

SELECT u.usr_id, u.usr_pwd, u.usr_email, u.cre_usr_id, u.cre_dt, u.upd_usr_id, u.upd_dt, u.del_flg, r.sys_role_id, r.sys_role_cd, r.sys_role_desc FROM usr u LEFT JOIN usr_sys_role ur ON u.usr_id = ur.usr_id AND ur.del_flg = 'F' AND ur.usr_role_status_cd = 'ACTIVE' LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.sys_role_id = r.sys_role_id AND r.del_flg = 'F' WHERE u.usr_email = #{email} AND u.del_flg = 'F'
SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM usr WHERE usr_id = #{usrId} )
SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM usr WHERE usr_email = #{email} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usr ( usr_id, usr_pwd, usr_email, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt, del_flg ) VALUES ( #{usrId}, #{usrPwd}, #{usrEmail}, #{creUsrId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{updUsrId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'F' )
